visaLibrary.title: US Visa Types Library
visaLibrary.description: Explore comprehensive information about different US visa categories. Click on any visa type to learn about eligibility requirements, application process, and benefits.
visaLibrary.cta.title: Need Help Choosing the Right Visa?
visaLibrary.cta.description: Our immigration experts can help you determine which visa category fits your situation best.
visaLibrary.modal.readyToApply: Ready to apply for the {code} visa? Our immigration attorneys can guide you through the entire process.
visaLibrary.visas.B1.name: Business Visitor
visaLibrary.visas.B1.description: Business visitor visa for temporary business activities in the United States.
visaLibrary.visas.B2.name: Tourist Visitor
visaLibrary.visas.B2.description: Tourist visa for pleasure, vacation, or visiting family and friends.
visaLibrary.visas.F1.name: Student
visaLibrary.visas.F1.description: Student visa for academic studies at accredited US institutions.
visaLibrary.visas.F2.name: Student Dependent
visaLibrary.visas.F2.description: Dependent visa for spouses and unmarried children under 21 of F1 students.
visaLibrary.visas.H1B.name: Specialty Occupation Worker
visaLibrary.visas.H1B.description: Specialty occupation visa for professionals with bachelor's degree or higher.
visaLibrary.visas.H2A.name: Agricultural Worker
visaLibrary.visas.H2A.description: Temporary agricultural worker visa for seasonal farm labor.
visaLibrary.visas.H4.name: H1B Dependent
visaLibrary.visas.H4.description: Dependent visa for spouses and unmarried children under 21 of H1B visa holders.
visaLibrary.visas.J1.name: Exchange Visitor
visaLibrary.visas.J1.description: Exchange visitor visa for cultural exchange programs.
visaLibrary.visas.L1A.name: Intracompany Transferee Executive
visaLibrary.visas.L1A.description: Intracompany transferee visa for managers and executives.
visaLibrary.visas.L1B.name: Intracompany Transferee Specialist
visaLibrary.visas.L1B.description: Intracompany transferee visa for employees with specialized knowledge.
visaLibrary.visas.L2.name: L1 Dependent
visaLibrary.visas.L2.description: Dependent visa for spouses and unmarried children under 21 of L1 visa holders.
visaLibrary.visas.O1.name: Extraordinary Ability
visaLibrary.visas.O1.description: Extraordinary ability visa for individuals with exceptional skills.
visaLibrary.visas.TN.name: NAFTA Professional
visaLibrary.visas.TN.description: NAFTA professional visa for Canadian and Mexican citizens.
visaLibrary.visas.E2.name: Treaty Investor
visaLibrary.visas.E2.description: Treaty investor visa for substantial investment in US business.
visaLibrary.visas.EB1.name: Priority Workers
visaLibrary.visas.EB1.description: First preference employment-based green card for priority workers.
visaLibrary.visas.EB2.name: Advanced Degree Professionals
visaLibrary.visas.EB2.description: Second preference employment-based green card for advanced degree holders.
visaLibrary.visas.EB3.name: Skilled Workers
visaLibrary.visas.EB3.description: Third preference employment-based green card for skilled workers.
visaLibrary.visas.EB4.name: Special Immigrants
visaLibrary.visas.EB4.description: Fourth preference employment-based green card for special immigrants.
visaLibrary.visas.EB5.name: Immigrant Investors
visaLibrary.visas.EB5.description: Fifth preference employment-based green card for investors.
